10: Substate: White Spirit State

x30_s6_e4: [Timer] Start timer
x30_s7: Immediate action: rolling
x30_s7_e0: [Operation] Lock off
x30_s7_x0: [Operation] Lock on
x30_s7_w0: [Attack] Random avoidance_Angle designation
x30_s8: Interim action: move left and right
x30_s8_e0: [Platoon] Set weight multiplier
x30_s8_w0: [Move] Horizontal move_Lock_Random
x30_s9: [LIB] Damage action: Terrain damage _SubState
x30_s10: Success: End state
x30_s11: Failure: termination state
x30_s12: Avoidance: termination state
x31: [LIB] Attack: Security confirmation at the end of the attack [DLC modified version]
x31_p0: Wait for end only
x31_p1: Attack short navigation distance
x31_p2: Timeout time
x31_s0: Start state
x31_s1: Attack: Final stage attack distance check (safety confirmation)
x31_s1_e0: [General] Reset short navigation mesh check result
x31_s1_e1: [General] Short Navi Mesh Check
x31_s2: Attack: Last attack distance check (danger confirmation)
x31_s2_e0: [General] Reset short navigation mesh check result
x31_s2_e1: [General] Short Navi Mesh Check
x31_s3: Attack: Danger avoidance lock-off
x31_s3_w0: [Operation] Lock off
x31_s4: Attack: Lock return
x31_s4_x0: [Operation] Lock on
x31_s5: Attack: waiting for termination
x31_s6: Begin attack
x31_s7: Critical end state
x31_s8: Safe end state
x31_s9: End state
